alert.note: Alert for Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 3:58AM CDT until May 15 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Missouri...Iowa... Mississippi River at Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, and Dubuque. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Missouri...Iowa...Illinois... Mississippi River at Keokuk LD19 affecting Hancock, Clark and Lee Counties. Mississippi River at Dubuque LD11 affecting Jo Daviess and Dubuque Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Le Claire LD14. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water affects the lowest houses along the Princeton river front. Water affects several local roads on Campbell`s Island and is at the foundations of a few homes. In Pleasant Valley, water is at the bases of or in many houses along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon and continue falling to 9.7 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued late this morning.
